Hero.description: Exclusive experience to enhance your beauty with modern techniques and personalized care.

Products.premiumHaircareSubtitle: We use the best haircare products selected by experts to enhance your beauty and keep your hair healthy.
Products.rcoDescription: Luxury haircare designed by top hairstylists. Color-safe, heat & UV protective, and vegan.
Products.k18Title: K18 - The Future of Hair Repair
Products.k18Description: Biotech-powered formula that restores hair strength and elasticity in just 4 minutes.
Products.colorWowTitle: Color Wow - The Science of Stunning Hair
Products.colorWowDescription: Advanced, science-backed formulas for high-performance color care without harmful ingredients.
